text: described by their friends as three
winners who set an example in life and
now in death
23 year old dental student dia shadi
barakat and 21 year old you so Mohammad
had only recently got married her sister
rather mohammed abu saleh was also with
them when they were shot in the head at
their apartment complex complex in
Chapel Hill and I just heard gunshot
they don't know what though they came
home they heard screaming
I heard the SAS series of seven or eight
noises and I initially thought it was a
car backfiring but after the back Bennet
they were gunshots 46 year-old Craig
Stephen Hicks who gave himself up to
police has been charged with their
murders on Wednesday he appeared before
a judge in Durham North Carolina
authorities say he's cooperating with
them inquiries are continuing at this
apartment complex a short drive from the
University campus police say that a
preliminary investigation indicated that
the motive for the attack was an ongoing
dispute between two neighbors over
parking but the father of two of the
victims maintains this was a hate crime
this case has generated a huge response
on social media with hundreds of
thousands from across the world
discussing the attack many believing it
was religiously motivated in a hastily
arranged press conference Hicks wife hit
back at those suggestions I can't say
with my absolute belief that this
incident had nothing to do with religion
or victims faith but in fact was related
to the long-standing parking disputes my
husband had with the neighbors police
say they'll exhaust every lead to work
out why these students were killed this
video of deer show some raising funds
for a trip to Turkey to help Syrian
refugees have you ever felt helpless
about the situation in Syria and felt
like you can't do anything about it
their friends say they were the kind of
people who touched the lives of everyone
who knew them
Rajini Vardy northern BBC News Chapel
Hill North Carolina
